name: Ca-AKG (Calcium Alpha-Ketoglutarate)
description: Calcium salt of alpha-ketoglutarate, a key TCA cycle metabolite. The CALERIE-adjacent Rejuvant study showed biological age reversal. Supports epigenetic regulation via TET enzyme cofaction and collagen synthesis. Branded version: Rejuvant (ProHealthspan).

dosage.notes: Calcium alpha-ketoglutarate specific form. Take on empty stomach. Rejuvant brand is most studied. May take 4-7 months for measurable epigenetic changes.

keyFindings: Reduced biological age by 8 years in 7-month Rejuvant trial (TruAge)
Extended lifespan ~12% in mice and reduced frailty (Buck Institute)
AKG levels decline 10-fold between ages 40 and 80
